column1: Kaliaganj  (also spelled as Kaliyaganj) is a city and a municipality in Uttar Dinajpur district in the Indian state of West Bengal.
The word "Kaliyaganj" is come from the word "Kaliya" means "Krishna"

Kaliaganj police station under West Bengal police has jurisdiction over Kaliaganj town and  Kaliaganj CD block. It is 22 km from the district headquarters and covers an area of 301.9 km2.There is a Town Outpost under this PS.
The headquarters of Kaliaganj CD block is at Kaliaganj town.In the map alongside

column1: Kaliaganj has a station on the  Barsoi-Radhikapur branch line.New broad gauge line from Kaliaganj to Buniadpur (33.10 km) was included in the budget 2010-11.  157.938 ha of land is to be acquired. As of August 2018
column2: project work by Northeast Frontier Railway is held up mainly because of paucity of funds.State Highway No. 10A
column3: running from Buniadpur to Raiganj passes through Kaliaganj town.
